import'../App.css';import React from"react";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import logo from"../components/back.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowLD=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[selectedDateStart,setSelectedDateStart]=useState("");const[selectedDateStop,setSelectedDateStop]=useState("");const[period,setPeriodday]=useState("");const[mode,setMode]=useState("");const splitDate=(dateString1,dateString2)=>{const[year1,month1,day1]=dateString1.split("-");const[year2,month2,day2]=dateString2.split("-");return{day1,day2,year1,year2,month1,month2};};useEffect(()=>{if(selectedDateStart&&selectedDateStop){const{day1,day2}=splitDate(selectedDateStart,selectedDateStop);setPeriodday(day2-day1);setMode("ld");}},[selectedDateStart,selectedDateStop]);const getShow=async()=>{try{// eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars
const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/getinfoshow",{datestart:selectedDateStart,datestop:selectedDateStop,period:period,mode:mode});navigate("/showreport");}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Containner-show",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Text-PS-H-ST",style:{alignSelf:'center'},children:"HORIZONTAL FREEZER CONTRACT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Text-PS-H-ST",style:{marginTop:'-35px',alignSelf:'center'},children:"SHOW REPORT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginLeft:'-480px'},children:"Day - Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:selectedDateStart,onChange:e=>setSelectedDateStart(e.target.value),min:"2024-01-01",max:"2025-12-31",className:"Date-picker",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{marginLeft:'-480px'},children:"Day - Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:selectedDateStop,onChange:e=>setSelectedDateStop(e.target.value),min:"2024-01-01",max:"2025-12-31",className:"Date-picker",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Button-Pull",onClick:getShow,children:"SHOW"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Div-back",style:{position:'fixed'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/show",className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"",className:"Back-ele",style:{}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Back-text",style:{position:'fixed'},children:"BACK"})]})})]});};export default ShowLD;
